termsText:
Please read the following terms of service carefully before using this service.

1. Membership registration is required to use this service.
2. Users must not engage in acts that violate laws or public order and morals.
3. The content of this service may be changed without notice.
4. For details, please refer to the official website.

(The following is a long terms of service...)
title: Title
titleMaxLength: Title must be at most 200 characters
usernameMaxLength: Username must be at most 20 characters
usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters

welcome.description: Please read the following terms of service before using our service.
welcome.terms:
Terms of Service (Sample)
Article 1 (Purpose)
These terms apply to all actions of users when using this service.
Article 2 (Prohibited Acts)
Users must not engage in the following acts.
- Acts that violate laws or public order and morals
- Acts related to criminal activity
- Other acts deemed inappropriate by the operator
Article 3 (Disclaimer)
The operator assumes no responsibility for any damages arising from the use of this service.
